context_of_use: This use case allows admins to create and update product records, including pricing and inventory management.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Control product availability and pricing
description: Allows admins to create and update product records, including pricing and inventory management.
preconditions: Admin is authenticated and authorized to manage products.
postconditions: Products are created or updated successfully in the system.
assumptions: Admin has the necessary permissions to manage products.
requirements_met: The system shall allow admins to create new products.
The system shall allow admins to update product prices.
The system shall allow admins to manage inventory levels.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the specific fields required for product creation and updates.
main_flow: 1. Admin creates a new product → System records the new product in the database.
2. Admin updates product prices → System updates the pricing information in the database.
3. Admin manages inventory levels → System adjusts inventory levels accordingly.
